title: Tech stunned by GCU - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Tech stunned by GCU - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: PHOENIX – No. 4 Texas Tech dropped its second game in a row to Grand Canyon on Wednesday, 8-7, at GCU Ballpark. Tech is on the wrong side of the win-loss column for the third straight time, marking its first three-game losing streak since April of 2021.
